snippet.title: Dino Path Trail | NG23 Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST DINO PATH TRAIL ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2481670/Dino_Path_Trail/

JOIN US ON DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/MN4c9Ksu6Q

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM:
https://www.instagram.com/dinopathtrail/

FOLLOW US ON X:
https://twitter.com/DinoPathTrail
_____________________________________
Dino Path Trail is a 3D Isometric Roguelike-Survival game with action based combat, set in a Wild West where Dinosaurs have never gone extinct.
Lucy, the protagonist, will face a journey through Canyons, Mountains, and Swamps, in the attempt of revenging her family, and saving her kidnapped sister from a terrible gang.
Embrace your destiny as time after time you learn the secrets of the Dino Path, gathering and crafting your tools and weapons to survive, and fighting your way to the lairs of the gang leaders, uncovering an ancient secret that binds you to these wild lands.

#UnityGame #IndieGameDev #UnityDevelopment #DinoPathTrail #GameDev #IndieGame #GamingCommunity #Unity3D #DinoGame #WildWestAdventure #GameArt #UnityGames
